trans-unit.source: Replace the chassis on a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Replace the chassis on a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to remove and replace the chassis on your StorSimple primary device or EBOD enclosure.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to remove and replace the chassis on your StorSimple primary device or EBOD enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to remove and replace a chassis in a StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to remove and replace a chassis in a StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple 8100 model is a single enclosure device (one chassis), whereas the 8600 is a dual enclosure device (two chassis).
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple 8100 model is a single enclosure device (one chassis), whereas the 8600 is a dual enclosure device (two chassis).

trans-unit.source: For an 8600 model, there are potentially two chassis that can fail in the device: the chassis for the primary enclosure or the chassis for the EBOD enclosure.
trans-unit.target: For an 8600 model, there are potentially two chassis that can fail in the device: the chassis for the primary enclosure or the chassis for the EBOD enclosure.

trans-unit.source: In either case, the replacement chassis that is shipped by Microsoft will be empty.
trans-unit.target: In either case, the replacement chassis that is shipped by Microsoft will be empty.

trans-unit.source: No Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs), controller modules, solid state disk drives (SSDs), hard disk drives (HDDs), or EBOD modules will be included.
trans-unit.target: No Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs), controller modules, solid state disk drives (SSDs), hard disk drives (HDDs), or EBOD modules will be included.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Before removing and replacing the chassis, review the safety information in [StorSimple hardware component replacement](storsimple-hardware-component-replacement.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Before removing and replacing the chassis, review the safety information in [StorSimple hardware component replacement](storsimple-hardware-component-replacement.md).

trans-unit.source: Remove the chassis
trans-unit.target: Remove the chassis

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to remove the chassis on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to remove the chassis on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To remove a chassis
trans-unit.target: To remove a chassis

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the StorSimple device is shut down and disconnected from all power sources.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the StorSimple device is shut down and disconnected from all power sources.

trans-unit.source: Remove all the network and SAS cables, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: Remove all the network and SAS cables, if applicable.

trans-unit.source: Remove the unit from the rack.
trans-unit.target: Remove the unit from the rack.

trans-unit.source: Remove each of the drives and note the slots from which they are removed.
trans-unit.target: Remove each of the drives and note the slots from which they are removed.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Remove the disk drive](storsimple-disk-drive-replacement.md#remove-the-disk-drive).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Remove the disk drive](storsimple-disk-drive-replacement.md#remove-the-disk-drive).

trans-unit.source: On the EBOD enclosure (if this is the chassis that failed), remove the EBOD controller modules.
trans-unit.target: On the EBOD enclosure (if this is the chassis that failed), remove the EBOD controller modules.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Remove an EBOD controller](storsimple-ebod-controller-replacement.md#remove-an-ebod-controller).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Remove an EBOD controller](storsimple-ebod-controller-replacement.md#remove-an-ebod-controller).

trans-unit.source: On the primary enclosure (if this is the chassis that failed), remove the controllers and note the slots from which they are removed.
trans-unit.target: On the primary enclosure (if this is the chassis that failed), remove the controllers and note the slots from which they are removed.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Remove a controller](storsimple-controller-replacement.md#remove-a-controller).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Remove a controller](storsimple-controller-replacement.md#remove-a-controller).

trans-unit.source: Install the chassis
trans-unit.target: Install the chassis

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to install the chassis in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to install the chassis in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To install a chassis
trans-unit.target: To install a chassis

trans-unit.source: Mount the chassis in the rack.
trans-unit.target: Mount the chassis in the rack.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rack-mount your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md#rack-mount-your-storsimple-8100-device) or [Rack-mount your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md#rack-mount-your-storsimple-8600-device).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Rack-mount your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md#rack-mount-your-storsimple-8100-device) or [Rack-mount your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md#rack-mount-your-storsimple-8600-device).

trans-unit.source: After the chassis is mounted in the rack, install the controller modules in the same positions that they were previously installed in.
trans-unit.target: After the chassis is mounted in the rack, install the controller modules in the same positions that they were previously installed in.

trans-unit.source: Install the drives in the same positions and slots that they were previously installed in.
trans-unit.target: Install the drives in the same positions and slots that they were previously installed in.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] In general, we recommend that you put the SSDs in the slots first, and then install the HDDs.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] In general, we recommend that you put the SSDs in the slots first, and then install the HDDs.

trans-unit.source: With the device mounted in the rack and the components installed, connect your device to the appropriate power sources, and turn on the device.
trans-unit.target: With the device mounted in the rack and the components installed, connect your device to the appropriate power sources, and turn on the device.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Cable your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md#cable-your-storsimple-8100-device) or [Cable your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md#cable-your-storsimple-8600-device).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Cable your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md#cable-your-storsimple-8100-device) or [Cable your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md#cable-your-storsimple-8600-device).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Learn more about [StorSimple hardware component replacement](storsimple-hardware-component-replacement.md).
trans-unit.target: Learn more about [StorSimple hardware component replacement](storsimple-hardware-component-replacement.md).
